interactive

Class SelectMenuState

  • java.lang.Object
    • interactive.InteractiveState
      • interactive.MenuState
        • interactive.SelectMenuState

  • public class SelectMenuState
extends MenuState
    Class implementing the different functionality in the select menu, especially the different behaviour of the mouse button 1.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz
